price: They said, “O our father, why do you not trust us with Joseph[5], although we truly care for him?
arabic: قَالُواْ يَٰٓأَبَانَا مَا لَكَ لَا تَأۡمَ۬نَّا عَلَىٰ يُوسُفَ وَإِنَّا لَهُۥ لَنَٰصِحُونَ
footnotes: [5] They formulated their challenging scheme carefully, in order to throw their father off guard.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center

meta.transliteration: qālū yāabānā mā laka lā tamannā ʿalā yūsufa wa-innā lahu lanāṣiḥūna
